Welcome to Visicupid.com ! Our community: Welcome to Visicupid.com ! Our community is built on mutual respect, trust, and kindness. To ensure a positive experience for all members, we ask that you adhere to the following guidelines. By using our website, you agree to these community standards.
Always be kind, respectful, and courteou: Always be kind, respectful, and courteous in your interactions. Harassment, hate speech, and offensive behavior are strictly prohibited.
Be truthful in your profile information: Be truthful in your profile information and communications. Misrepresentation, including using fake photos or false information, undermines trust and is not tolerated.
Never share your personal information su: Never share your personal information such as home address, phone number, financial details, or work address with strangers.
Do not ask for personal details from oth: Do not ask for personal details from others that they are not comfortable sharing. Respect their boundaries and privacy.
If you encounter any suspicious behavior: If you encounter any suspicious behavior, harassment, or violations of these guidelines, report it to our support team immediately.
Ensure that your profile photos and info: Ensure that your profile photos and information are appropriate and respectful. Inappropriate or explicit content is not allowed.
Keep your messages polite and respectful: Keep your messages polite and respectful. Avoid using offensive language, making inappropriate comments, or sending unsolicited explicit content.
Any form of harassment, including but no: Any form of harassment, including but not limited to, unwanted messages, stalking, or threats, is strictly prohibited.
Discriminatory behavior based on race, e: Discriminatory behavior based on race, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, religion, or any other characteristic is not tolerated.
Use the website with genuine intentions: Use the website with genuine intentions to form meaningful connections. Any form of deceit, manipulation, or scam is strictly prohibited.
Do not use the platform for commercial p: Do not use the platform for commercial purposes, solicitation, or advertising.
Take responsibility for your actions and: Take responsibility for your actions and words. If you make a mistake, acknowledge it and apologize.
Adhere to these guidelines and the terms: Adhere to these guidelines and the terms of service. Failure to comply may result in suspension or termination of your account.
If a conflict arises, address it calmly: If a conflict arises, address it calmly and respectfully. If you cannot resolve the issue, contact our support team for assistance.
Do not engage in public disputes on the: Do not engage in public disputes on the platform. Handle conflicts privately and maturely.
Be a supportive member of the community. Offer help and encouragement to others, and contribute positively to the community environment.
These guidelines may be updated periodic: These guidelines may be updated periodically. Stay informed about any changes by regularly reviewing this page.
We value your feedback. If you have sugg: We value your feedback. If you have suggestions for improving these guidelines or the community experience, please contact us.
At Visicupid.com, we are committed to cr: At Visicupid.com, we are committed to creating a safe, respectful, and enjoyable environment for everyone. By following these community guidelines, you help us achieve this goal. Thank you for being a valuable member of our community.
